tweet: The GNWT has received approval for assistance from the @CanadianForces (CAF) local Rangers, to support flood preparedness and response activities in impacted and at risk communities along the Mackenzie River. This will help ensure residents are safe. #nwtpoli

name: Caroline Cochrane
tweet: On Saturday, over 11,000 lbs of donated groceries were flown into Fort Simpson to help residents displaced by flooding.
